## AppletServices.bindAsset property

Bind an asset (srcWal) to an asset in your applet (dstWal).

**Signature:**

```typescript
bindAsset: (appletClient: AppClient, 
    srcWal: WAL, 
    dstWal: WAL, 
    dstRecordInfo?: RecordInfo) => Promise<void>;
```
